ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | int-eqmvtd.1 | |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) |

| 3 |  | int-eqmvtd.3 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 4 |  | int-eqmvtd.4 | |- ( ph -> A = ( C + D ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> B = ( C + D ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( B - D ) = ( ( C + D ) - D ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( C + D ) - D ) = C ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( B - D ) = C ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> C = ( B - D ) ) |
